title: Little Serpent
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2GCassQ

by Elijah_Avada

When Voldemort went to the Potter’s home that fateful night, he hadn’t been expecting to find his soulmate in one of the twins… Really, it wasn’t like he had planned to take the boy and fake both of their deaths, and then raise the boy like a true Slytherin. Now if only Dumbledore and his little bird shits would stop looking for his angel!

blog.name: unragazzotimidoedolce
blog.title: LittleOne
blog.description:
Sono un ragazzo dolce, timido, semplice,educato, riservato, solo, onesto e molto affettuoso. Non mi fido molto delle persone, ma ho un obiettivo in testa e un giorno si realizzerà.
Mi piace leggere, programmare, guardare dei film, giocare ai videogiochi.Sono quel ragazzo differente dagli altri, sono quel ragazzo che non ama essere giudicato, sono quel ragazzo che ride sempre nonstante la mia vita piena di cose negative, sono quel ragazzo sensibile, cerco sempre di socializzare con gli altri ma alla fine mi deludono, sono ritenuto complicato dai miei genitori e stupido dai miei compagni, solo le persone che mi conoscono bene, sanno che sono un ragazzo speciale.Ammiro tanto voi donne.Single. Rayane/15 anni.

tags: he tells her how grumpy Harry can be in the mornings
how he doesnt wake up till mid-shower
sometimes to the point it drives Draco nuts
he tells her how much she is loved
that Harry thinks of her often
summary: Drarry  Where every Mother’s Day, Draco spends his morning at Godrics Hollow telling Lily’s grave everything about her son. From...
body:
Drarry

Where every Mother’s Day, Draco spends his morning at Godrics Hollow telling Lily’s grave everything about her son. From his grumpy mornings to his horribly messy hair that Draco refuses to admit he loves.

He wants to make sure she knows how much he appreciates who she had been and wants to give her a chance to know Harry, even if only the wind can hear him.

blog.name: charmhazel1983
blog.title: All Things Harry Potter
blog.description: Proud Hufflepuff, Self-Confessed Potterhead, Diehard Hinny Shipper, Cursed Child Super Fan and HP Fanfic Writer.

summary: Attraction: The House of Minalima, Greek Street, London One of the best thing about the stunning artwork that Minalima design...
caption:
Attraction: The House of Minalima, Greek Street, London

One of the best thing about the stunning artwork that Minalima design for the Wizarding World if the sheer amount of detail that goes into every piece, especially the adverts and newspaper articles. I always love looking at the adverts and newspapers to see what little things they have snuck in, whether as hint or tribute to the wizarding world itself or nods towards the London area. 

Little hint to fans: Take the time to take in the little details of every piece of artwork you can, you never know what you may find!

blog.name: platform9and3quartrs
blog.title: Wolfstar. Drarry. Must I Go On?
blog.description:
Ella•Hufflepuff with Slytherin tendencies•fangirl af

One day my life will not revolve around fictional characters. Today is not that day

Background by alek-r

summary:
Lily: Sirius just admit that you love Remus!
Sirius: I like Remus as much as the next guy.
Sirius: I mean, clearly, I have...
body:
Lily: Sirius just admit that you love Remus!

Sirius: I like Remus as much as the next guy.

Sirius: I mean, clearly, I have feelings for him, but feelings don’t mean love!

Sirius: You know? I mean, do I have loving feelings for Remus?

Sirius: Yeah!

Sirius: Yes, I have continuing feelings of love, but that doesn’t mean I’m in love with him!

Sirius: You know, I mean, I have sexual feelings for him but, but…

Sirius: But, I do love him!

Sirius: *gasps dramatically*

Sirius: Shit

Sirius: WHY DIDNT YOU TELL ME

Lily: Sorry, we all thought you knew

blog.name: dictionarywrites
blog.title: Dictionary Writes
blog.description:
Here in the most grudging manner possible until more people make the sensible choice and come to Dreamwidth instead. This blog is 18+ only: minors don't interact.

Find me on Dreamwidth or Ao3!

summary: Did I misunderstand or you sneakily killed Rita Skeeter, by having Draco atacking her while she was disguised as a beetle?
question: Did I misunderstand or you sneakily killed Rita Skeeter, by having Draco atacking her while she was disguised as a beetle?
answer:
[Harry] picks out a small, pink box, and he takes some of the pods inside out. He heads over to the fire, and drops them in. Immediately, it roars to life, sending a beautiful wave of heat through the room that makes a lot of the Slytherins sigh with relief, but then the pods crack open in the fire, and they send out their fiery wisps.

One is a stallion that gallops and jumps through the air, and another is a shark that dives and flips above their heads: they’re called Flookes, and they’re a Zonko’s product, Harry is pretty sure. Theodore grins as he watches the flaming figures dance through the air, and despite himself, Draco looks like he’s trying to hold back a smile.

“What’s this, Potter?” he demands. It lacks the icy edge he attempts to add to it. Harry looks back to him, and he sees what Draco has pulled from the paper bag. Brandishing his new weapon with hilarious authority, Draco holds the fly swat Ted Tonks had sent Harry for Christmas.

“It’s for killing flies,” Harry says simply, sitting on the arm of Theodore’s armchair and coaxing Winston into his lap. “You swat them with the flat bit. It’s a Muggle thing - I got sent it as a bit of a joke.” Draco furrows his silver brow, examining the swat with an unwarranted fascination.

“What’s it made of?” Draco gives it an experimental wave, and he looks so ridiculous that Harry can’t help but grin at him. He’s still annoyed at the other boy, obviously, is still furious with what he did, but… Draco Malfoy is such a ridiculous idiot of a boy even when he’s not holding a fly swat. It’s difficult to take him seriously.

“Plastic,” Harry answers, and is about to go on when Draco yells, “A-ha!” and slams the swat down on the coffee table. There’s a quiet crunch, and Harry arches his eyebrow. Draco pulls the swat away from the table, showing the green shell of a beetle clinging to the swat’s thatched main piece. “Well done.”

“I thought flies and stuff couldn’t get in here?” Blaise asks tiredly, opening one eye. There are enchantments on the doors and windows, but Harry knows they’re not foolproof.

“It’s probably from one of the NEWT Potions people,” Theodore explains, without looking up from his book. “Alyssa Harvey was chasing after a pink mouse the other night. Put it in the fire, Draco, don’t just leave it there.” Taking out a handkerchief, Draco cleans up the remains of the beetle from the swat and the table and drops the whole, green mess into the fire. Just as the Flookes had, the crushed beetle lets up a little ghost of green - Harry thinks, just for a second, that the smoky ghost resembles a set of spectacles.

“Did you see Skeeter’s article in the Prophet?” Draco asks, glancing back from the fire. Harry nods his head. Draco waits for a few, long moments, looking at Harry’s face, and then he says, “Sorry.”

None of them realize because none of them ever know that Rita Skeeter is an Animagus, but yeah, that was her, and she is dead. It surprises me how many people ask if they read it right or not, just because it isn’t explicitly stated.

One is a stallion that gallops and jumps through the air, and another is a shark that dives and flips above their heads: they’re called Flookes, and they’re a Zonko’s product, Harry is pretty sure. Theodore grins as he watches the flaming figures dance through the air, and despite himself, Draco looks like he’s trying to hold back a smile.

“What’s this, Potter?” he demands. It lacks the icy edge he attempts to add to it. Harry looks back to him, and he sees what Draco has pulled from the paper bag. Brandishing his new weapon with hilarious authority, Draco holds the fly swat Ted Tonks had sent Harry for Christmas.

“It’s for killing flies,” Harry says simply, sitting on the arm of Theodore’s armchair and coaxing Winston into his lap. “You swat them with the flat bit. It’s a Muggle thing - I got sent it as a bit of a joke.” Draco furrows his silver brow, examining the swat with an unwarranted fascination.

“What’s it made of?” Draco gives it an experimental wave, and he looks so ridiculous that Harry can’t help but grin at him. He’s still annoyed at the other boy, obviously, is still furious with what he did, but… Draco Malfoy is such a ridiculous idiot of a boy even when he’s not holding a fly swat. It’s difficult to take him seriously.

“Plastic,” Harry answers, and is about to go on when Draco yells, “A-ha!” and slams the swat down on the coffee table. There’s a quiet crunch, and Harry arches his eyebrow. Draco pulls the swat away from the table, showing the green shell of a beetle clinging to the swat’s thatched main piece. “Well done.”

“I thought flies and stuff couldn’t get in here?” Blaise asks tiredly, opening one eye. There are enchantments on the doors and windows, but Harry knows they’re not foolproof.

“It’s probably from one of the NEWT Potions people,” Theodore explains, without looking up from his book. “Alyssa Harvey was chasing after a pink mouse the other night. Put it in the fire, Draco, don’t just leave it there.” Taking out a handkerchief, Draco cleans up the remains of the beetle from the swat and the table and drops the whole, green mess into the fire. Just as the Flookes had, the crushed beetle lets up a little ghost of green - Harry thinks, just for a second, that the smoky ghost resembles a set of spectacles.

“Did you see Skeeter’s article in the Prophet?” Draco asks, glancing back from the fire. Harry nods his head. Draco waits for a few, long moments, looking at Harry’s face, and then he says, “Sorry.”

None of them realize because none of them ever know that Rita Skeeter is an Animagus, but yeah, that was her, and she is dead. It surprises me how many people ask if they read it right or not, just because it isn’t explicitly stated.

blog.name: ununquadius
blog.title: Drarry Chats (Mostly)
blog.description: AO3: ununquadius  // Follows, comments and likes from azaharperezoso Feel free to correct my mistakes, English is not my first language | Header by @cubedcoffeecake

title: APRIL: JUST RIGHT
body:
Read on AO3 | Drarry | 294 words

Thank you to timothysboxers for the April 2019 prompt “Just Right” that inspired this fic. And thank you to goldwish for being such a lovely beta <3

*

“When are you going to talk to them?” Harry asked while he served breakfast, avoiding looking at Draco, although he looked at him to see his reaction.

“I don’t know. Stop asking me, alright?” Draco glared at him from his place at the table.

“That’s what you always say! That I should wait, that you’re going to do it, but then you never do it. You know, sometimes I think that you…” All the doubts Harry had came to his mind, he tried to refrain them, but it had been too long since they inhabited his heart.

“That I what?”

“That you don’t love me, or that you’re ashamed of me or…”

Draco’s face went from angry to horrified in a second, which helped calm Harry just a bit.

“Harry! How can you think that I…? It’s not that! It’s not that at all, okay? I love you. A lot. But…”

“Yeah, I know. You don’t want your parents to know that you and I are dating,” he said in a bored voice.

“I’m… I’m scared that if they know… Maybe they’ll be ashamed of me, or they’ll hate me, or they won’t accept me then and… hurt you.”

“Draco.” His boyfriend had started to cry quietly, holding himself and looking at the table where the forgotten breakfast awaited. “Draco, I’m sorry. I’m sorry. I didn’t know that was why you haven’t talked to them. I’m so sorry.”

“Will you wait a bit more?” He whispered, hopeful.

“Of course, all you need. And if you tell them and they don’t like it, I’ll be here for anything you need, okay? To cry, to kill them…”

“I hope we don’t have to do that.”

“But I bet all will be right.”

“Sure.”

“Yep, just right.”

title: Übernachten im Harry-Potter-Stil
body:
Harry-Potter-Fans aufgepasst: Ihr könnt nun in einer ganz speziellen Location übernachten.

Welcher Fan des Zauberers hat noch nie davon geträumt, in einem Häuschen zu übernachten, das Hagrids Hüttedetailgetreu nachgeahmt ist? Wir haben nun gute Nachrichten: Ihr könnt das ab sofort einfach machen.

Michael Gambon: Ist der “Harry Potter”-Star krank?

Im nordenglischen North Shire hat ein Landhaus eröffnet, das zwar nicht am Rande des verbotenen Waldes, aber trotzdem sehr idyllisch liegt. Bis zu sechs Personen können in der liebevoll gestalteten Unterkunft unterkommen. Unter anderem stehen Euch eine Küche, ein Essbereich und ein offener Kamin zur freien Verfügung. Alle Zimmer sind so ausgestattet, als wäre man Teil eines Harry-Potter-Films. Besonders gelungen ist das Badezimmer.

Magic! Harry Potter fans can now rent a holiday cottage that looks exactly like Hagrid’s hut ⁦@MailOnline⁩ https://t.co/8H5e2zZL6b

— BH&HPA (@BHHPA) 27. April 2019

Herr-der-Ringe-Häuschen gibt es auch

Eigentümerin ist Carol Cavendish, die der “Daily Mail” erzählte, dass Bücher immer schon ein wichtiger Teil ihres Lebens gewesen wären. Deshalb sei es fantastisch, eine Umgebung zu schaffen, “in der auch andere den Alltag hinter sich lassen und in ihr Lieblingsbuch eintreten können”, sagte sie.

Wer noch Lust auf weitere besondere Unterkünfte hat, kann gleich dort bleiben. Auf dem Anwesen gibt es auch ein Hobbit-Haus wie in “Der Herr der Ringe”.

VIDEO: Harry-Potter-Feeling in Rio

summary: And honestly, Sirius is one of the best characters ever. He didn't mind being different from his family, he never tried to rub...
body: And honestly, Sirius is one of the best characters ever. He didn’t mind being different from his family, he never tried to rub his pure blood status in others’ faces - heck he was best friends with a muggle-born. He was badass, a rebel (remember how he stuck posters of muggle bikes and muggle girls in bikins in his room just to piss of his family? That was GOLD) and brave and loving and intelligent and so many things. It really saddens me to think that he never got love from his family, he didn’t even get married or have children. He had to spent years in a cruel prison for a crime he didn’t commit. I can’t imagine how he must have felt when he met Harry - a brave and smart and somewhat reckless boy who played Quidditch. I just can’t accept whatever happened with Sirius. I can’t. He deserved so much more. I don’t blame JK for anything though, but I just hope things would have turned out better for Sirius Black.

summary: Please never ever forget that Sirius saw James in Harry. He felt like he got his best friend back in Harry. Harry wasn't just...
body: Please never ever forget that Sirius saw James in Harry. He felt like he got his best friend back in Harry. Harry wasn’t just his godson, Sirius considered Harry to be his best friend.

reblog.comment: Please never ever forget that Sirius saw James in Harry. He felt like he got his best friend back in Harry. Harry wasn’t just his godson, Sirius considered Harry to be his best friend.

trail.content_raw: Please never ever forget that Sirius saw James in Harry. He felt like he got his best friend back in Harry. Harry wasn’t just his godson, Sirius considered Harry to be his best friend.
trail.content: Please never ever forget that Sirius saw James in Harry. He felt like he got his best friend back in Harry. Harry wasn’t just his godson, Sirius considered Harry to be his best friend.

blog.description: An automated feed for the Tom/Harry and Voldemort/Harry AO3 tags. Not a fic recs blog.

title: attachment
description:
by Limonium

Harry’s duty as a forest guardian apprentice is to do a blood ritual every month, a routine conducted on all towers of Hogwarts. Tom knew he is injured and comes to check on him.

Words: 1262, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Harry Potter, Tom Riddle | Voldemort

  • Additional Tags: Fluff and Hurt/Comfort, Fluff, i like fluff but sometimes my hand slips and i realize there’s a bit of drama
